remarks: Defining properties 3 and 4 of a polynomially closed function set ` P ` : it is closed under pointwise addition and multiplication. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Oct-2014.)
statement: mzpcl34 $p |- ( ( P e. ( mzPolyCld ` V ) /\ F e. P /\ G e. P ) -> ( ( F oF + G ) e. P /\ ( F oF x. G ) e. P ) ) $.
